mapper.insert: insert into proposals( id, detail, referRecruitMentorId, referUserId, createdAt, updatedAt, isDeleted ) values( #{id}, #{detail}, #{referRecruitMentorId}, #{referUserId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, false )

update proposals set updated_at = #{updatedAt}, isDelete = true, where id = #{id}
